A list of words in [[Tuigan (language)|Tuigan]], one of the languages of the [[Hordelands]].<ref>

A.Amyashi: A strong dust storm that could last for days at a time.
A.Arban: A military organization or group of 10 men.

C.Cangue: A heavy wooden yoke used on criminals.
C.Cham: A spirit, either good or evil.

J.Jagun: A military organization or group of 10 arbans, 100 men.

K.Kebtut: A member of the night guard of the Kashik.
K.Khahan: An elected leader of all khans.
K.Kharachu: An insult referring to a commoner.
K.Knout: A three-pronged whip used on horses.

L.Lama: A priest of the Path of Enlightenment.

M.Minghan: A military organization or group of 10 jaguns, 1000 men.

N.Noyan: Designation for a noble or noble family.

O.Ordu: Three or four oboghs combined together.

P.Paitza: Metal plate used a a sign of the khahan's favor.

T.Tumen: A military organization or group of 10 minghans, 10,000 men.
T.Turgut: A member of the day guard of the Kashik.

U.Unaghan bo'ol: A yurt slave, also used as an insult.

V.Vildonrat: The Tuigan name for the [[Vil Adanrath]].

Y.Yasa: A code of law for nomads.
Y.Yeke-noyan: An honorary title given to deceased nobles, meaning "Great Chieftain."
Y.Yurtchi: An official in charge of the scouts and camp of an army.
